summary: A central utility library that consolidates common helper routines for working with large language model APIs. It offers iterators for synchronous and asynchronous responses, streaming wrappers, provider configuration handling, token counting, request construction, retry logic, and convenience functions for processing messages, images, and audio data.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate and manage interactions with multiple LLM providers efficiently, reducing boilerplate code, improving reliability through retries and timeout handling, and simplifying tasks such as token accounting and media processing.
